text: Front-end developer who designs and builds responsive and user-friendly websites and apps, specialising in JavaScript and React.
UX/UI designer experienced in user stories, user flows, wireframing, UI design, prototyping, colour schemes and UI components.
Skilled in building, integrating and testing back-end systems, including databases and APIs.
Collaborated with agile teams (product development) delivering UX/UI solutions for SaaS apps.
10 years prior experience in design before moving into development.
